High & Low: G-Sword OVA: Bundled with the limited edition volume 5 of the High & Low: G-Sword manga. The DVD contained all the episodes of the previously released G-Sword anime (the TV eps, the Movie eps, the Special theme park eps), as well as containing 5 brand new episodes focusing primarily on rival gangs.
['High & Low: G-Sword', 'High & Low: G-Sword (Movie)', 'High & Low: G-Sword (Special)']
